serviceLivelog.step1Description: Quickstart Guide tells you how to start using Livelog on your device.
serviceLivelog.step2Description: The Usage Guide tells you how to use the application, according to our standard model.
serviceLivelog.step3Description: Download the Client Package and install it to your TAK device according to the Quickstart Guide, to get using the app.
serviceLivelogUsageCard.title: Purpose
serviceLivelogUsageCard.content:
• Real-time tracking of friendlies (GPS).
  • Send observations to the command post (HQ) for interpretation.
  • Follow the Recon Feed that your command post (HQ) creates for your unit.
serviceLivelogUsageView.title: Livelog
